auto_renewal.notice_to_cancel: 60 days prior to end of term

obligations.description: Responsible for all actions taken by Authorized Users
obligations.source_text: Customer is responsible for all actions taken by Authorized Users

obligations.description: Ensure all Authorized Users comply with Agreement
obligations.source_text: Customer shall ensure all Authorized Users comply with this Agreement

obligations.description: Maintain confidentiality of all login credentials
obligations.source_text: Customer shall maintain the confidentiality of all login credentials

obligations.description: Immediately notify Company of any unauthorized access
obligations.source_text: Customer shall immediately notify Company of any unauthorized access

obligations.description: Cannot reverse engineer, disassemble, or derive source code of Services
obligations.source_text: Customer shall not, and shall not permit any third party to: (c) Reverse engineer, disassemble, decompile, or attempt to derive the source code of the Services

obligations.description: Cannot access Services to build a competitive product
obligations.source_text: Access the Services to build a competitive product or service

obligations.description: Cannot use automated tools without written consent
obligations.source_text: Use automated tools to access the Services without Company's written consent

obligations.description: Grant Company license to use Customer Data for improving services and creating aggregated data
obligations.source_text: Customer grants Company a worldwide, royalty-free, non-exclusive license to access, use, process, copy, distribute, perform, export, and display Customer Data solely as necessary to provide the Services and as otherwise permitted by this Agreement

obligations.description: Responsible for accuracy, quality, legality of Customer Data and obtaining necessary consents
obligations.source_text: Customer is solely responsible for: (a) The accuracy, quality, integrity, and legality of Customer Data; (b) The means by which Customer acquires Customer Data; (c) Obtaining all necessary consents and permissions to collect and use Customer Data; (d) Backing up Customer Data (Company is not responsible for data loss)

obligations.description: Pay fees in advance on annual basis
obligations.source_text: Fees are due in advance on an annual basis

obligations.description: Pay invoices within 30 days
obligations.source_text: All payments are due within thirty (30) days of invoice date

obligations.description: Pay all taxes, levies, and duties
obligations.source_text: Fees do not include taxes. Customer is responsible for all taxes, levies, duties, and assessments arising from this Agreement, excluding taxes based on Company's net income

obligations.description: Provide 60 days written notice to prevent auto-renewal
obligations.deadline: 60 days prior to end of term
obligations.source_text: Unless Customer provides written notice of non-renewal at least sixty (60) days prior to the end of the then-current term, the Subscription Term shall automatically renew for successive periods equal to the initial term

obligations.description: Pay all fees through end of term even if terminating early
obligations.source_text: Customer may terminate this Agreement upon written notice, provided that: (a) No refund of prepaid Fees shall be provided; (b) Customer shall pay all Fees due through the end of the then-current Subscription Term

obligations.description: Pay all outstanding fees upon termination
obligations.source_text: Upon termination: (b) Customer shall pay all outstanding Fees

obligations.description: Assign all Feedback to Company without compensation
obligations.source_text: If Customer provides any suggestions, ideas, enhancement requests, recommendations, or other feedback relating to the Services ("Feedback"), Customer hereby assigns to Company all right, title, and interest in and to such Feedback and agrees that Company may use Feedback for any purpose without any obligation to Customer

obligations.description: Indemnify Company for claims arising from Customer's use of Services
obligations.source_text: Customer shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Company and its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any and all claims, damages, losses, liabilities, costs, and expenses (including reasonable attorneys' fees) arising out of or relating to: (a) Customer's use of the Services; (b) Customer Data or any content provided by Customer; (c) Customer's breach of this Agreement; (d) Customer's violation of any applicable law; (e) Any claim by a third party relating to Customer's use of the Services

obligations.description: Consent to data transfer outside country of residence
obligations.source_text: Customer Data may be stored and processed in any country where Company or its service providers maintain facilities. Customer consents to the transfer of Customer Data outside of Customer's country of residence

obligations.description: Agree to Company using third-party subprocessors for Customer Data
obligations.source_text: Customer agrees that Company may use third-party subprocessors to process Customer Data

obligations.description: Comply with all export control laws
obligations.source_text: Customer agrees to comply with all applicable export control laws and regulations

obligations.description: File any claims within 1 year of cause of action accruing
obligations.source_text: ANY CAUSE OF ACTION OR CLAIM CUSTOMER MAY HAVE ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT OR THE SERVICES MUST BE COMMENCED WITHIN ONE (1) YEAR AFTER THE CAUSE OF ACTION ACCRUES. OTHERWISE, SUCH CAUSE OF ACTION OR CLAIM IS PERMANENTLY BARRED

obligations.description: Use commercially reasonable efforts for 99.5% uptime
obligations.source_text: Company shall use commercially reasonable efforts to make the Services available 99.5% of the time during each calendar month, excluding scheduled maintenance and circumstances beyond Company's reasonable control

risk_flags.title: Auto-renewal with 60-day notice requirement
risk_flags.description: Subscription auto-renews for same period unless 60 days notice given - easy to miss and get locked in for another year
risk_flags.source_text: Unless Customer provides written notice of non-renewal at least sixty (60) days prior to the end of the then-current term, the Subscription Term shall automatically renew for successive periods equal to the initial term

risk_flags.title: No refunds under any circumstances
risk_flags.description: All fees are non-refundable even if service is terminated or fails to meet expectations
risk_flags.source_text: Fees are non-refundable under any circumstances

risk_flags.title: Company can increase fees with only 30 days notice
risk_flags.description: Company can raise prices at any time with minimal notice; continued use = acceptance
risk_flags.source_text: Company may increase Fees at any time upon thirty (30) days' prior notice. Continued use of the Services after a fee increase constitutes acceptance of the new Fees

risk_flags.title: Company can suspend for 15 days past due
risk_flags.description: Very short grace period before suspension - only 15 days past due
risk_flags.source_text: Company may suspend Customer's access to the Services if any Fees remain unpaid for more than fifteen (15) days past due. Company shall not be liable for any damages resulting from such suspension

risk_flags.title: Company can terminate for any reason with 30 days notice
risk_flags.description: Company can terminate at any time for any or no reason, while Customer must pay through end of term
risk_flags.source_text: Company may terminate this Agreement or suspend Customer's access to the Services: (c) Upon thirty (30) days' written notice for any reason or no reason

risk_flags.title: Customer must pay through end of term even if terminating
risk_flags.description: No early termination - must pay for entire subscription period regardless
risk_flags.source_text: Customer may terminate this Agreement upon written notice, provided that: (a) No refund of prepaid Fees shall be provided; (b) Customer shall pay all Fees due through the end of the then-current Subscription Term

risk_flags.title: No service credits for downtime
risk_flags.description: Even if 99.5% uptime target is missed, Customer gets no refunds or credits
risk_flags.source_text: Notwithstanding Section 6.1, Customer shall not be entitled to any service credits, refunds, or other remedies for any failure to meet the availability target

risk_flags.title: Company can modify or discontinue features without notice
risk_flags.description: Company can remove features Customer relies on at any time without liability
risk_flags.source_text: Company reserves the right to modify, update, or discontinue any features or functionality of the Services at any time, with or without notice. Company shall have no liability for any such modifications or discontinuations

risk_flags.title: Broad rights to use Customer Data for any business purpose
risk_flags.description: Company can use Customer Data to improve their products, create aggregated data, and share with third parties indefinitely
risk_flags.source_text: Customer acknowledges and agrees that Company may: (a) Use Customer Data to improve, enhance, and develop the Services and Company's other products and services; (b) Create anonymized, aggregated, and/or de-identified data derived from Customer Data; (c) Use Aggregated Data for any business purpose, including analytics, benchmarking, and machine learning; (d) Share Aggregated Data with third parties; (e) Retain Aggregated Data indefinitely, even after termination of this Agreement

risk_flags.title: Liability capped at 3 months of fees
risk_flags.description: Maximum damages limited to just 3 months of fees paid - may be far less than actual damages
risk_flags.source_text: COMPANY'S TOTAL CUMULATIVE LIABILITY ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT SHALL NOT EXCEED THE FEES PAID BY CUSTOMER DURING THE THREE (3) MONTHS IMMEDIATELY PRECEDING THE EVENT GIVING RISE TO THE CLAIM

risk_flags.title: Company not liable for data loss
risk_flags.description: Company has no liability for any loss, corruption, or unauthorized access to Customer Data
risk_flags.source_text: COMPANY SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY LOSS, CORRUPTION, OR UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS TO CUSTOMER DATA, REGARDLESS OF CAUSE

risk_flags.title: No liability for data breaches
risk_flags.description: Company not liable for damages from security breaches despite handling Customer Data
risk_flags.source_text: In the event of a security breach affecting Customer Data, Company shall notify Customer within a reasonable time after discovery. Company shall not be liable for any damages resulting from a data breach

risk_flags.title: 1-year statute of limitations on claims
risk_flags.description: Claims must be filed within 1 year or are permanently barred - much shorter than typical statutes
risk_flags.source_text: ANY CAUSE OF ACTION OR CLAIM CUSTOMER MAY HAVE ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT OR THE SERVICES MUST BE COMMENCED WITHIN ONE (1) YEAR AFTER THE CAUSE OF ACTION ACCRUES

risk_flags.title: Mandatory binding arbitration in Delaware
risk_flags.description: All disputes must go to AAA arbitration in Wilmington, Delaware
risk_flags.source_text: ANY DISPUTE, CLAIM, OR CONTROVERSY ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT OR THE SERVICES SHALL BE RESOLVED EXCLUSIVELY THROUGH FINAL AND BINDING ARBITRATION. THE ARBITRATION SHALL BE ADMINISTERED BY THE AMERICAN ARBITRATION ASSOCIATION ("AAA") IN WILMINGTON, DELAWARE

risk_flags.title: Class action and jury trial waivers
risk_flags.description: Customer waives rights to class actions and jury trials
risk_flags.source_text: YOU AND COMPANY EACH AGREE THAT ANY DISPUTE RESOLUTION PROCEEDINGS WILL BE CONDUCTED ONLY ON AN INDIVIDUAL BASIS AND NOT IN A CLASS, CONSOLIDATED, OR REPRESENTATIVE ACTION. YOU HEREBY WAIVE ANY RIGHT TO PARTICIPATE IN A CLASS ACTION LAWSUIT OR CLASS-WIDE ARBITRATION

risk_flags.title: Company can unilaterally modify Agreement
risk_flags.description: Company can change terms at any time by posting on website; continued use = acceptance
risk_flags.source_text: Company may modify this Agreement at any time by posting the revised terms on its website or notifying Customer by email. Continued use of the Services after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the modified Agreement

risk_flags.title: Data may be transferred to any country
risk_flags.description: Customer Data can be stored/processed anywhere Company has facilities with no restrictions
risk_flags.source_text: Customer Data may be stored and processed in any country where Company or its service providers maintain facilities. Customer consents to the transfer of Customer Data outside of Customer's country of residence

risk_flags.title: 1.5% monthly interest on late payments
risk_flags.description: Late fees accrue at 18% annual rate
risk_flags.source_text: Company may charge interest on late payments at 1.5% per month or the maximum rate permitted by law

risk_flags.title: Vague 'reasonable time' for breach notification
risk_flags.description: Company only required to notify of data breach within 'reasonable time' - not specific
risk_flags.source_text: Company shall notify Customer within a reasonable time after discovery

key_definitions.definition: Customer's employees, contractors, and agents who are authorized by Customer to access and use the Services
All data, information, content, and materials that Customer or Authorized Users upload, submit, store, or transmit through the Services
The period during which Customer has subscribed to access and use the Services
Anonymized, aggregated, and/or de-identified data derived from Customer Data
Suggestions, ideas, enhancement requests, recommendations, or other feedback relating to the Services

_annotation_notes: This SaaS agreement is heavily provider-favorable with: no refunds, no service credits, 3-month liability cap, no data breach liability, broad data usage rights, unilateral modification rights, and auto-renewal traps. The combination of no SLA remedies plus no liability for data loss puts significant risk on the Customer. Company can essentially terminate, change terms, or remove features at will with minimal recourse for Customer.
